text: is a fighting video game series, and was created by Hudson Soft and developed by Eighting (formerly as Raizing). The series has been published worldwide by multiple companies, such as: Konami, Activision, Sony Computer Entertainment, and Virgin Interactive. Konami holds the rights to the franchise, after Hudson Soft was absorbed into the former company in 2012. Category:Video game series
title: Bloody Roar (series)
